Detailed Description

Headers for the configuration for the LTC analog front-end.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ LTC_N_BYTES_FOR_DATA_TRANSMISSION

#define LTC_N_BYTES_FOR_DATA_TRANSMISSION   (4 + (8 * LTC_N_LTC))

Number of Bytes to be transmitted in daisy-chain For first 4 Bytes:

  • 2 Bytes: command
  • 2 Bytes: CRC Following Bytes: Data
  • 6 Bytes data per LTC
  • 2 Bytes CRC per LTC

Definition at line 79 of file ltc_cfg.h.

◆ LTC_N_BYTES_FOR_DATA_TRANSMISSION_DATA_ONLY

#define LTC_N_BYTES_FOR_DATA_TRANSMISSION_DATA_ONLY   (0 + (6 * LTC_N_LTC))

Number of Bytes to be transmitted in daisy-chain Data

  • 6 Bytes data per LTC

Definition at line 86 of file ltc_cfg.h.

◆ LTC_N_LTC

#define LTC_N_LTC   (BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING)

Number of used LTC-ICs

Definition at line 68 of file ltc_cfg.h.
